languages.text: {n}С той стороны вокса раздается смех.{/n} "Мне и моим просьбам сложно отказывать, {name}. Твои вокс-операторы — не исключение из этого правила".

traits.locale_text: {n}С той стороны вокса раздается смех.{/n} "Мне и моим просьбам сложно отказывать, {name}. Твои вокс-операторы — не исключение из этого правила".

languages.text: {n}Your question is met with laughter.{/n} "Few dare to refuse when I ask, {name}. Your vox operators are no exception to this rule."
languages.original_text: {n}С той стороны вокса раздается смех.{/n} "Мне и моим просьбам сложно отказывать, {name}. Твои вокс-операторы — не исключение из этого правила".

traits.locale_text: {n}Your question is met with laughter.{/n} "Few dare to refuse when I ask, {name}. Your vox-operators are not an exception to this rule."
{n}Your question is met with laughter.{/n} "Few dare to refuse when I ask, {name}. Your vox-operators are not an exception to this rule."
{n}Your question is met with laughter.{/n} "Few dare to refuse when I ask, {name}. Your vox-operators are no exception to this rule."
{n}Your question is met with laughter.{/n} "Few dare to refuse when I ask, {name}. Your vox-operators are no exception to this rule."
{n}Your question is met with laughter.{/n} "Few dare to refuse when I ask, {name}. Your vox operators are no exception to this rule."

languages.text: {n}Deine Frage wird mit Gelächter quittiert.{/n} "Wenige wagen es, mir eine Bitte abzuschlagen, {name}. Eure Vox-Operateure sind da keine Ausnahme."
languages.original_text: {n}Your question is met with laughter.{/n} "Few dare to refuse when I ask, {name}. Your vox operators are no exception to this rule."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Frage wird mit Gelächter quittiert.{/n} "Wenige wagen es, mir eine Bitte abzuschlagen, {name}. Eure Vox-Operateure sind da keine Ausnahme."

languages.text: {n}你的问题引起了一串大笑。{/n}“很少有人敢拒绝我的要求，{name}。你的音阵操作员也不例外。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your question is met with laughter.{/n} "Few dare to refuse when I ask, {name}. Your vox operators are no exception to this rule."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的问题引起了一串大笑。{/n}“很少有人敢拒绝我的要求，{name}。你的音阵操作员也不例外。”

languages.text: {n}Un rire jaillit aussitôt de l'émetteur.{/n} « Peu de gens ont l'audace de me refuser quoi que ce soit, {name}. Et vos opérateurs vox n'en font pas partie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your question is met with laughter.{/n} "Few dare to refuse when I ask, {name}. Your vox operators are no exception to this rule."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un rire jaillit aussitôt de l'émetteur.{/n} « Peu de gens ont l'audace de me refuser quoi que ce soit, {name}. Et vos opérateurs vox n'en font pas partie. »

languages.text: {n}Recibes una risa por respuesta.{/n} «No hay mucha gente que se atreva a negarme lo que pido, {name}. Tus operadores de voco no son la excepción a la regla».
languages.original_text: {n}Your question is met with laughter.{/n} "Few dare to refuse when I ask, {name}. Your vox operators are no exception to this rule."

traits.locale_text: {n}Recibes una risa por respuesta.{/n} «No hay mucha gente que se atreva a negarme lo que pido, {name}. Tus operadores de voco no son la excepción a la regla».

languages.text: {n}疑問は笑い声にかき消される。{/n}「俺の頼みを断るような愚か者はいないよ、{name}。お前のヴォクスオペレーターも例外ではない」
languages.original_text: {n}Your question is met with laughter.{/n} "Few dare to refuse when I ask, {name}. Your vox operators are no exception to this rule."

traits.locale_text: {n}疑問は笑い声にかき消される。{/n}「俺の頼みを断るような愚か者はいないよ、{name}。お前のヴォクスオペレーターも例外ではない」

languages.text: {n}Sorun, kahkahayla karışık buluyor.{/n} "Bir şey istediğim zaman beni reddetmeye cüret eden pek olmaz {name}. Bu dediğim, voks operatörlerin için de geçerli."
languages.original_text: {n}Your question is met with laughter.{/n} "Few dare to refuse when I ask, {name}. Your vox operators are no exception to this rule."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorun, kahkahayla karışık buluyor.{/n} "Bir şey istediğim zaman beni reddetmeye fazla kişi cüret edemez {name}. Voks operatörlerin de bu kuralın istisnası değiller."
